title: Getting Started with Akira Docs
description: A guide on how to use Akira Docs effectively, including examples and best practices for documentation.
author: Anonymous

blocks.content: Welcome to the Akira Docs Getting Started guide! This document will help you set up your environment, install necessary dependencies, and provide a basic usage example to get you started with Akira Docs.

Node.js
Package Manager (npm or Yarn)
TypeScript
Basic Knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript
Follow these steps to set up your project:

mkdir akiradocs-example
cd akiradocs-example
npm init -y
npm install typescript --save-dev
Now that you have everything set up, you can create a simple documentation page.
Explore more features of Akira Docs and start creating comprehensive documentation for your projects.
Documentation is key to a successful project.
